entries.title: The 8 devices I always take on work trips

entries.title: The 5 best SSDs of 2023
entries.description: Whether you're building your first PC or looking to upgrade, a solid state drive (SSD) can give your computer a boost of speed as well as storage capacity. Brands like Western Digital, PNY, and even Samsung have some of the best SSDs to fit every application and budget.
